articles.content:
Report on talks between DPRK, Japan Red Cross organizations
     Pyongyang, August 7 (KCNA) -- A report on the talks between the Red Cross organizations of the DPRK and Japan was released.
 According to it, the DPRK Red Cross Society and the Japan Red Cross agreed to hold the talks in Pyongyang on August 18 and 19.    
 The talks will take up the issue of investigating the missing persons, the issue of hometown-visiting of Japanese women in the DPRK and other humanitarian issues.
